Ingredients.1: 1 head cauliflower, cored and separated into florets

Ingredients.7: 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Puree cauliflower in a food processor until finely ground.

Directions.3: Cook ground cauliflower, water, and salt together in a skillet over medium-high heat until fragrant and most of the water evaporates, 5 to 6 minutes. Cool completely.

Directions.4: Transfer cauliflower to the center of a clean dish towel. Wrap and squeeze tightly to remove all excess moisture. You should have about 1 1/2 cups cauliflower pulp.

Directions.5: Stir cauliflower, goat cheese, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, egg, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl to form a soft dough. Gather dough into a ball and place in the center of the prepared baking sheet. Press dough into circle about 1/4-inch thick.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and set, about 40 minutes. Cool and turn crust over before topping.
